SEARCH
Module FloWeekTracker
Package org.example.floweektracker.tasksDatabase

Class SingleTaskManager

java.lang.Object
com.floweektracker.tasksDatabase.SingleTaskManager
public class SingleTaskManager extends Object
Represents the management of a single task in the org.example.floweektracker.planner's system. Contains fields with information about the task and access methods to these fields.

Fields:
  • taskName - a String representing the task's name
  • time - a String representing the task's time
  • isDone - a boolean value representing execution status of the task
  • weekDay - a WeekDays enum representing the task's weekday name
  • priority - a byte value representing the task's priority
  • description - a String representing the task's description
Methods:
  • toString() - returns a String representation of this object
Getters: getTaskName(), getTime(), getIsDone(), getWeekDay(), getPriority(), getDescription()

Setters: setTaskName(String), setTime(String), setDone(boolean), setWeekDay(WeekDays), setPriority(byte), setDescription(String)

    • SingleTaskManager

      public SingleTaskManager()
      Constructs a new SingleTaskManager instance representing a user's task. It initializes references to the taskName, time, isDone, weekDay, priority, and description with default values.

      • TaskAddingDialogUI
